## ConfigureOptions interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface ConfigureOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [appEndpoint](./node-client.configureoptions.appendpoint.md) | <code>string</code> | The app endpoint. |
|  [assetEndpoint](./node-client.configureoptions.assetendpoint.md) | <code>string</code> | The Skygear asset endpoint. If it is omitted, it is derived by pre-pending <code>assets.</code> to the domain of the app endpoint. |
|  [authEndpoint](./node-client.configureoptions.authendpoint.md) | <code>string</code> | The Skygear Auth endpoint. If it is omitted, it is derived by pre-pending <code>accounts.</code> to the domain of the app endpoint. |
|  [clientID](./node-client.configureoptions.clientid.md) | <code>string</code> | The OAuth client ID. |
